text: Ezɨ a gumazir kurar kaba inigha uamategha Ofran ghugha, uan afeziamɨn dɨpenimɨn ghua uan aveghbuar 70pla, dagɨar dafar mam gisɨn bar me mɨsoghezɨ, me ariaghire. Kar an aveghbuabara, Jerubalɨn otariba. Ezɨ Jotam, Jerubalɨn otarir abuananam arav ghugha modo, kamaghɨn amizɨ, Abimelek a mɨsoghezir puvatɨ.
